formattedAddress: 117 W Broadway, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 117 W Broadway, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text: I had a facial with Kristen yesterday at Onda and it was HEAVEN.  First of all the environment is so serene and calm, I felt more relaxed the minute I entered the treatment room.  Even though I was booked for the signature facial Kristen asked me a bunch of questions and customized the treatment specifically to my issues.  Not only did I get an incredible facial but she also really helped relieve the stress in my neck and shoulders so I essentially got a massage as well.  Most importantly my skin is GLOWING..  I have issues with redness and broken capillaries that I thought could only be treated with laser but my skin tone is greatly improved.  My face is soft and smooth and a feel more plumpness and see less fine lines.  Seriously one of the best facials I've ever had and I've gone almost everywhere in the city.

originalText.text: This business has been through a couple iterations and is now truly coming back to its roots. Luxurious personalized treatments, the best products, and the most incredibly comfortable treatment bed. The staff will guide you if you want or just let you browse through and test everything. It always smells great, in a cozy and slightly exotic way- like you’ve somehow been transported and on a mini vacation. They have a great selection of makeup- I don’t wear much- but the 3 to 4 things I use, I’m obsessed with. Also, they are always adding or expanding the product selection- so you are bound to discover something new with every visit.

originalText.text: ONDA is a serendipitous oasis offering its clients and community a moment of tranquility in an otherwise demanding and urgency-fueled city. With their focus on using only clean beauty products, I know that I am using the best for my skin and body while protecting the planet. Its staff is kind, inviting, and creates a wonderful experience.

originalText.text: I have become a huge devotee of clean skin/beauty products and Onda has an outstanding selection. The owner Larissa is so knowledgable and helpful. She provided excellent product and treatment recommendations for my teens.The store is beautiful and so calming.  I can't wait to try their treatments.

She provided excellent product and treatment recommendations for my teens.The store is beautiful and so calming.  I can't wait to try their treatments.

originalText.text: I love ONDA!  The facials by Kristin are magical. She has golden hands. The products they sell are wonderful and effective, and they give lots of good advice if you have questions. And the vibe is warm, welcoming and delicious!
